# maxCameraDistance

**Interface Property**

The maximum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
maxCameraDistance?: number;
```

## Setting distance constraints

- **minCameraDistance**: The minimum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.
